timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
.withDescription("Optional flag to skip fields and rows with parse errors instead of failing;\n"
+ "fields are set to null in case of errors");
.withDescription("Optional flag to skip fields and rows with parse errors instead of failing, "
+ "fields are set to null in case of errors. Default is false.");
timeline.author: wuchong

timeline.bodyHTML:
Can be simplified to :

boolean failOnMissingField = tableOptions.get(FAIL_ON_MISSING_FIELD);
boolean ignoreParseErrors = tableOptions.get(IGNORE_PARSE_ERRORS);
timeline.author: wuchong
